targets
• To identify 50 per cent of pregnant women
at risk by 1997, 60 per cent by 1998, 70per cent by 1999, and 80 per cent by theyear 2000.
• To enable the district hospital to perform
operative delivery by 1998.
• To develop a standard referral procedure
by 1997.
To reduce the maternal
mortality ratio to half of1990 levels by the year2000.
• To give tetanus immunization to all
pregnant women who come for prenatalcare.
• To give proper cord care to 50 per cent of
